analysis: The project is a static website focused on black holes, with existing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. The theme should emphasize a cosmic, dark aesthetic with animations related to black holes. The current files need updates to fully implement the black hole theme, including animated objects, slides, and interactive elements.

improvements.description: Add a cosmic-themed header with a black hole image and navigation menu, including sections for black hole facts, animations, and interactive slides.
Implement a dark cosmic theme with black hole animations, swirling effects, glowing elements, and Egyptian-themed color palette as described in the constraints.
Add functionality for animated black hole slides, interactive elements, and smooth transitions for mobile menu toggles and navigation.
